about_the_game:
Wild, untamed, powerful as a panther, Carla rolls through the horde like a force of nature. One look into her eyes and you will be thunderstruck!

Customize your slayers with our premium character pack. Steel Horse Carla includes:

- Pantera Trueno skin for Carla
- The Van Flensing - this weapon can be used by any of the 6 slayers
